actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Subcommittee on Water and Power. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 99-258.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to perform studies relating to disposal of drain water and to construct interim corrective measures deemed necessary for the San Luis intercepter drain.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to study and take interim corrective measures for the distribution, drainage, and disposal of drainage water in the San Joaquin Valley of the Central Valley project, California. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1986.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to perform studies relating to disposal of drain water and to construct interim corrective measures deemed necessary for the San Luis intercepter drain.
